attributes.additional_details:
hungry party who think they can rule over the EU however they feel fit.
we the undersigned no longer want to be a part of  Brussels, Europe or its laws, lies and thieving of England's funds ways. 
England joined to trade not to be dictated to.
We demand an independent vote on leaving the EU. 
We demand this vote be done before the end of 2015, we DO NOT want to wait until 2016.
GET ENGLAND OUT OF THE EU AND DO IT NOW !!
attributes.background: England joined the European Union in the 70s on the promise that it would be  cheaper and easier to trade in Europe, this has failed in every which way possible  and not benefited ENGLAND / GREAT BRITAIN in any way whatsoever, Brussels have gone from a  multiple trading associate to a power
